name: Braeburn
description:
Braeburn is an interactive fiction piece by Conner Shaw (finished on 5 December 2017) created using Inform 7. In the piece, you take the role of a scientist who has discovered teleportation technology. You will discover more as the story progresses.

To move through the story, you need to interact with a command line and move through somewhat concrete or otherwise abstract methods. Hints as to how to respond will come through in descriptions. Verbs like "take, enter, examine" will be the most helpful.
